pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | TravelGo TravelGo About us Hit Travels Contacts Privacy Policy At TravelGo, safeguarding your privacy is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information and are committed to maintaining the confidentiality, integrity, and security of the data you entrust to us. Your Rights As a user of TravelGo's services, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also request to restrict or object to the processing of your data. We respect your rights and will handle your requests promptly and transparently. Data Retention We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. Once your data is no longer needed, we securely dispose of it in accordance with our retention policies and legal requirements. International Transfers Your personal information may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside of your country or region. By using TravelGo's services, you consent to the transfer of your data to these locations, which may have different data protection laws than your jurisdiction. Children's Privacy TravelGo's services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately to request deletion of the information. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookies through your browser settings and opt-out of certain tracking technologies. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not operated or controlled by TravelGo. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit. Changes to this Policy We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates or changes. Contact Us If you have any questions, concerns, or feedback regarding our Privacy Policy, please don't hesitate to contact us at info.travelgo@gmail.com. Our dedicated team is here to assist you and address any inquiries you may have. Thank you for entrusting TravelGo with your travel needs. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting it every step of the way. Our commitment to your privacy extends beyond the digital realm. We adhere to strict data protection standards to safeguard your personal information at all times. Whether it's encrypting your payment details or implementing access controls on our servers, we employ industry best practices to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of your data. We understand the importance of transparency in our data practices. That's why we provide detailed explanations of the information we collect, how it's used, and who we share it with. We believe in empowering our users to make informed decisions about their privacy. Protecting your privacy is an ongoing commitment for us. We continuously evaluate and enhance our security measures to stay ahead of emerging threats and vulnerabilities. Rest assured, your trust in TravelGo is our highest priority. Should you have any questions or require further clarification about our Privacy Policy, we encourage you to reach out to our dedicated support team. We're here to address your concerns and ensure your peace of mind. Thank you for trusting TravelGo with your travel needs. We value your privacy and are dedicated to providing you with a secure and enjoyable experience. Our commitment to your privacy extends beyond the digital realm. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | TravelGo TravelGo About us Hit Travels Contacts Terms and Conditions Welcome to TravelGo! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of TravelGo's website and services. By accessing this website and using our services, you agree to abide by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using our website and services. The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions: Client: Refers to you, the person accessing this website and accepting the Company's terms and conditions. The Company: Refers to TravelGo. Party: Refers to both the Client and ourselves. Service Provider: Refers to third-party entities providing travel-related services through TravelGo's platform. Content: Refers to all text, images, graphics, and other materials displayed on TravelGo's website. Use of Our Services: TravelGo provides a platform for users to search, compare, and book travel-related services such as flights, hotels, car rentals, and tour packages. By using our services, you agree to provide accurate and complete information required for bookings. You also agree not to use our services for any unlawful or prohibited activities. Booking and Payments: All bookings made through TravelGo are subject to availability and confirmation by the service provider. Payment for bookings may be processed through third-party payment gateways. Any additional charges incurred during your trip, such as taxes or fees, are your responsibility. We reserve the right to cancel bookings or suspend accounts in the event of suspected fraud or unauthorized activities. Cancellation and Refunds: Cancellation policies vary depending on the service provider and are outlined during the booking process. Refunds, if applicable, will be processed according to the cancellation policy of the service provider. Some bookings may be non-refundable or subject to cancellation fees. Intellectual Property: The content, logos, trademarks, and intellectual property displayed on TravelGo's website are the property of TravelGo or its licensors. You may not use, modify, reproduce, or distribute any content from this website without prior written consent. However, you may share content through social media platforms for personal, non-commercial use. Limitation of Liability: TravelGo shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our services. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of information provided by service providers. You agree to indemnify and hold TravelGo harmless from any claims or liabilities arising from your use of our services. Modification of Terms: TravelGo reserves the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically for any updates or changes. Your continued use of our website and services after the posting of changes constitutes acceptance of those changes. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at info.travelgo@gmail.com. Our dedicated customer support team is available to assist you and address any inquiries you may have. By using TravelGo's website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Our commitment to your privacy extends beyond the digital realm. We adhere to strict data protection standards to safeguard your personal information at all times. Whether it's encrypting your payment details or implementing access controls on our servers, we employ industry best practices to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of your data. We understand the importance of transparency in our data practices. That's why we provide detailed explanations of the information we collect, how it's used, and who we share it with. We believe in empowering our users to make informed decisions about their privacy. Protecting your privacy is an ongoing commitment for us. We continuously evaluate and enhance our security measures to stay ahead of emerging threats and vulnerabilities. Rest assured, your trust in TravelGo is our highest priority.
